entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] AOT: segfault in mono-aot-cross for `System.Collections.Tests` #88358
    8.0.0
  • Bad Windows batch file syntax in libraries test script #88353
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!(*use)->OperMayThrow(m_compiler)' #88349
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbCodeOffs <= succBlock->bbCodeOffs' #88348
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make `System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes` compatible with COM source generator #88347
    Future
  • Build break in Mono Android extra-platforms #88344
  • Console.CursorTop causes invalid Console.ReadKey input #88343
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to Activity and friends #88332
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add an ApproximateCount property to System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary #88328
    Future
  • Align GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command for MacCatalyst. #88325
  • JIT: Utilize liveness for regularly promoted locals in physical promotion store decomposition #88319
    Future
  • JIT: Support SIMD sized remainders in physical promotion #88318
    Future
  • JIT: Enregister 32-byte and 64-byte sized structs in SIMD registers #88317
    Future
  • Read files generated by obsolete BinaryFormatter #88316
  • `impImportCnsTreeFromBuffer` can create incorrectly typed `TYP_DOUBLE` trees #88315
    8.0.0
  • Analyzer: change Enumerable.Concat with single element arrays into Append or Prepend #88314
    Future
  • The JIT is trying to compile all instantiations for Vector`1 once Span is used #88312
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.sh #88307
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/regressions/V1/SEH/asm/NestedExcept/NestedExcept.sh #88306
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #88305

Closed

  • EqualityComparer<string>.Default.Equals is never inlined #88021
    Future
  • crossgen/ilc --help weird indentation #88304
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.Tests crashes on NativeAOT #88339
  • TcpListener should implement IDisposable #63114
    8.0.0
  • Error: Unable to read data from the transport connection: Connection reset by peer when using Httpclient in Dotnet core api #86893
    8.0.0
  • DateTime Comparison fails with different DateTimeKind #88309
  • Methods JITed during startup #67398
    8.0.0
  • DateTimeOffset.ParseExact unable to parse day 1 year 1 #88335
  • Quic tests AVing on free #84435
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - some refactoring, and rationalizing #88357
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Get rid of a quirk removing GTF_EXCEPT on a faulting indir #88355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix libraries Windows test runner script #88354
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Don't block Android builds from configuring/using a cross compiler #88352
    blocked, os-android, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88351
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] Agresive JS minification #88350
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm versions before 14.x. #88346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Permit trailing data after PKCS12 on iOS #88340
    area-System.Security, os-ios
  • Update binding generator to do case-insensitive config-key/property name matching, & make some formatting improvements #88338
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88336
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Disable DllMap on mobile too #88333
    area-Build-mono
  • [QUIC] Unified source file formatting #88330
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Internalize assetUniqueQuery as modulesUniqueQuery #88329
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] log errors of Task/Promise marshaling #88326
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Reenable disabled tests as mono now respects non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #88322
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix CoreCLR tests build with skipmanaged option #88321
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve LoggerFactory and Logger debugging #88313
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix floating point #88311
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • Try adding cross-compilers for Musl #87841
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Shrink column width in `ilc --help` #88356
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect sequence number used in NTLM signature calculation #87998
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix condition for ENSURE_PRIMARY_STACK_SIZE #88342
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • TcpListener should implement IDisposable #88043
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Remove mono_loader_save_bundled_library() #88331
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove TODO from a comment in System.Guid.cs #88337
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Upgrade to LLVM 16 & C++17, and bundle libc++ on Linux #87190
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2213840 #88301
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Crossgen] Don't display list of enum values in help #88324
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] fix memfuncs for FreeBSD #88300
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Improve Hosting debugging #88308
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Expose stack trace metadata stripping as a supported option #88235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT Watson changes for crashes/unhandled exceptions #88273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Using stackalloc instead of new byte[x] on Streams #88303
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move IMeterFactory to System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource #88302
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • fix TLS resume with HttpClientHandler on Linux #88214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add custom hosts file support to Dns #87832
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Use wider look-up table while searching chars on Arm64 #88183
    arch-arm64, area-System.Buffers, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix missing GC events on non-Windows for nativeaot #88282
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (6/6) #88093
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Implement JsonTypeInfoResolver.WithAddedModifier #88255
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [NO MERGE] Expriments with QuicStream sending #88256
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [IGNORE] [mono] Add support for SSE1 in JIT mode. #88075
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix crash happening due to invalid pointer to free() #86868
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Missing symbol crash fix #86864
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Workaround for insufficiently sized destination buffer #88184
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • JIT: Handle primitive-sized remainders overlapping padding/promotions in physical promotion #88109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support to specify substitutions externally #88230
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Dedup Task.WhenAll non-generic and generic implementations #88154
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [RISCV] Fix .cfi directives for ThePreStub #88259
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [nativeaot] Add Native AOT cross-build support for iOS-like platforms #88242
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to june 23 #2318

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Call runtime imports implemented by runtime exports directly #2321
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Debug break on assertion failure #2327

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 SDK is complaining about Source Link problems in completely unrelated Git submodules #33755

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault on `PublishTrimmed=true` #33757
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Test PR #33754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: fix some auth issues. #33753
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • Fix typo in TransformWebConfig.cs #27034
  • Fix CmdOption name and aliases #33720
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix typo in ZipFileCreateFromDirectory.cs #29097
  • Fixed some issues with `details` command #33694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [WorkloadInstall] Simplify code workload install command line #24028
  • Rename _EnableConsumingManagedCodeFromNativeHosting to EnableNativeHostActivation #23159
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update NetAnalyzers version for release/7.0.1xx #29463
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: The request for using a mixed mode interface during instance creation. #7317

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Surface a warning at the declaration site for members that will be hidden by the language `[InlineArray]` support #68868
    C# 12.0
  • Surface a warning at the declaration site for language incompatible `[InlineArray]` types #68867
    C# 12.0
  • CS1591 Thinks "protected" is public #68863
  • Improve error message for explicit cast of collection literal to non-generic type #68862
  • $" quotes do not auto-complete in many scenarios #68861

Closed

  • IDE0078 fix leads to reduce number of calls to method #68860

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge features/CollectionLiterals into release/dev17.7 #68866
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval, untriaged
  • Update Telemetry version to 17.7.57 #68865
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Warn on shadowing primary constructor parameter by a member from base #68864
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Merged

  • Thread in the correct cancellation token into the code action operation #68859
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Lookahead parsing for collection exprs vs. local functions. #68807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Fix crash in interpolation handling #68845
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Remove ReturnsVoidIsSetBit flag #68846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Allow function breakpoints before module symbols are loaded #67600
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid quadratic lookup of namespace declarations #68832
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Simplify and make consistent query-context tracking in the parser #68757
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WASM IndexOutOfRangeException inside RenderTreeDiffBuilder.AppendAttributeDiffEntriesForRange #49192
  • [Blazor] Reenable ICU sharding tests #49191
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #49190
  • .NET 7 WPF app doesn't run on specific Windows 11 desktops #49189
  • HostingBundle Installer Not Ingesting Registry Key Values #49184
  • Post docker compose and starting the microservice , service url comes back ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE #49182
  • Short circuit attribute #49181
  • Suggested improvements to RevalidatingServerAuthenticationStateProvider #49176
  • BLAZOR - Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'createElementNS') In Blazor #49173
  • StaticHtmlRenderer uses synchronous writes which eventually fails #49172
    8.0-preview7
  • Adding the raw text input formatter #49168
  • Object does not have a property matching the name '@rendermode' #49167
    8.0-preview7

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #49164
  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries, updates #49162
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #49169
  • [Blazor] Migrating property from one-way to two way binding #49186
  • Add debugging when running in WSL for Blazor WebAssembly #49119
  • ViewData / ViewBag equivalent for Blazor server side rendering #49131
  • Type conversions of component route parameters #49141
    8.0-preview7
  • Minimal API with authorization policy throws 'Unable to find the required 'IAuthenticationService' service' when policy fails #49073
  • Rate Limiting - Ability to consume a variable amount of tokens per request #47456
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #49161
  • Add-Migration throwing execption #49051

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup blazor wasm template #49188
    area-blazor
  • Add EmptyContent parameter to Virtualize component #49185
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix Http MinimalSample #49174
    area-runtime
  • Fix typo. #49171
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Update _Imports.razor to include sections namespace #49166
    area-mvc

Updated

  • [Blazor] Add support for antiforgery #49108
    area-blazor
  • Add public metadata types. #49068
    area-runtime
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Use SearchValues in PathString #49117
    area-runtime
  • Fix endpoints not being available in debug view until after WebApplication starts #49103
    area-hosting

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App won't run n Windows Machine #15978
  • iOS - CollectionView incorrect behaviors #15977
  • Cant't get BindableProperty to work #15976
    Backlog
  • Maui - SwipeView not working with Editor control in iOS #15975
    Backlog
  • Unable to publish and generate ipa file in .net 8.0 preview 5 #15973
  • Memory Leak: MAUI-Windows are not garbage-collected after destroy of MainActivity #15972
    Backlog
  • Archiving apk using .net 7.0+ for android includes wrong platforms #15971
    Backlog

Closed

  • Unable to add an event handler via XAML if the event is internal #12566
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Menu missing accelerators #5211
    .NET 8
  • Add comment to Colors.xaml about Android specific colors #9039
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.FontManager: Warning: Unable to load font 'sans-serif-medium' from assets. #13239
    Backlog
  • .net maui & ios #14273
  • iOS simulators arnt listed and physical device fails to deploy #14366
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppRecipesSearch_Searchbymealtypesection_Resize: After resizing the font size to largest name of the "Meal types" present under 'Search by meal type' are not visible. #15228
    .NET 8

PullRequests

Created

  • Include headers/footers in EmptySource count so they show up when ItemsSource is null #15979
  • Add MaxLength limit to cursor position updates #15970
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry

Merged

  • [X] Connect event to internal handler #15881
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Add note to Colors.xaml to make people aware of Android specific colors #15855
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview6] Update aspnet packages #15887
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15955
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xxx-preview6] Merge net8.0 to preview6 #15943

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • [Android] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance. #15734
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
    area/layout 🔲
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Refactor `IsRefreshing` property to separate animation and command execution responsibilities #15732
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [X] Compiled Bindings to Array #15944
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
  • Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generates invalid SQL Server migrations script for computed stored with specific collation #31177
  • Comparison of nullable owned entity may return incorrect result (true when owned entity is not null) #31176
  • ValidateJsonEntities: System.InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains no elements #31175
  • Db first with Columns that may exist in dev but not prod #31173

Closed

  • Accessing tracked entites cause exception #31171

PullRequests

Created

  • Add DateOnly.FromDateTime query mapping for SQL Server #31180
  • Add complex property support to relational model #31174

Updated

  • Use IDbSetCache.GetSets() when checking for resettable services #31154
